text:
Creatives in Crisis: Surviving and Preparing for a Post-Covid Economy
.
Nicholas Chee, founder of SG COVID-19 Creative/Cultural Professionals & Freelancers Support Group, shares his insight about the post-COVID19 economy.
.
Watch it now at https://www.apart.sg/featured-season-8/creativesatwork-survive-prep-post-covid-economy-s8
.
#TogetherapARTsg #apARTsgSeason8 | @creativesatwork
